items.text: fuller length on off, and it's defended from the crease again
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: The opening bowlers have kept both batsmen quiet, particularly Tamim. Required rate up to 5.36 now
items.text: shot. Back of a length again, but Soumya latches on to it quickly, swivels to pull this powerfully to deep square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: better line, good length in the corridor and he has Sarkar feeling for it with bat away from body
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: pacy one on a length outside off, Sarkar almost looked like he wanted to take his bat out of the way to let it through at the last moment, but was late on it and it hits the bat on the way to third man
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: too full and on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: angling into him again, and he wants to flick it but is beaten and it strikes him on the pads
items.postText: Tasmeem: "@Yoel, during the big bash was the last time. West Indies were playing at Bangladesh."
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off again, doesn't quite come on as quickly and he under-edges the chop to cover
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: effort ball but loses his line and again down leg. wide
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: good length around off, clipped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length around off, doesn't bounce quite as much, he stays in his crease and punches to mid-off
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: angling into him, on a length, he misses the tickle and it hits his pad on the way to short fine. Stifled appeal, but that was going down leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length again, very close to off, he punches off the back foot to mid-on. Doesn't time it
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length and sticking to that tight line on off which denies Tamim any room. He dabs it in front of him looking for a single but is wisely sent back
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length and a quick one on the stumps, he jabs it towards point
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Some excellent bowling to Tamim in this Powerplay. They haven't given him room or the lengths to hit
items.text: yorker length on stumps, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: another fuller length ball on the stumps and Sarkar defends it back
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he punches to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: uppish, but in the gap. Drew him into the drive, with Sarkar leaning forward and with bat away from the body. But his placement was right even if he hit it uppishly and he finds the cover fence
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker length again, and Sarkar digs it back to the bowler. The momentum means he's walking forward and Cottrell immediately has a shy at the stumps, but misses.
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller but too straight and he flicks it off his pads to square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Aaron : "CSK and Bangladesh currently even at this point, with CSK having lost two wickets... should make for an enthralling contest... " - CKS have just lost Watson too, so they are three down. Bangladesh doing a lot better, I'd say...
items.text: oooh that's through him. Angling in from around the wicket, pitches on a length and takes off, while also straightening. Nothing the batsman could have done about that, and it whistles past his outside edge while he's stuck on the crease
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller, driven to cover
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: angling into him again, ends up on the pads but Sarkar misses the tuck to square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: yorker length on the stumps, he goes back to defend it with a straight bat
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he steers it to third man
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
